{{also|arm|Arms|ARM|ärm|Ärm|Arm.}} ==English== ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|?}} # {{abbreviation of|en|Armenian}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=amr|-mar-|AMR|MAR|MRA|Mar|Mar.|RAM|RMA|Ram|mar|mar-|ram}} ---- ==German== {{picdic |image=Arm_flex_supinate.jpg |width=240 |height=310 |labels= {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=290|posy=160|link=Schulter|align=right}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=125|posy=240|link=Oberarm}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=50|posy=235|link=Ellbogen}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=75|posy=150|link=Unterarm}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=110|posy=90|link=Handgelenk|align=right}} {{picdiclabel|de|color=white|fontsize=12|posx=150|posy=45|link=Hand}} |detail1=Click on labels in the image |detail2= {{picdicimg|de|link=Glied}} }} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Armb}} {{qual|obsolete}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|arm}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*armaz}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*h₂ermos}}, {{m|ine-pro|*h₂ŕ̥mos}}, an extension of {{m|ine-pro|*h₂er-||to fit together, to link, to join}}. Cognate with {{cog|nl|arm}}, {{cog|en|arm}}, {{cog|sv|arm}}. The Indo-European root is also the source of {{cog|la|armus}} and {{m|la|arma}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/(ʔ)aʁm/}} (''standard'') * {{IPA|de|/(ʔ)aːm/}} (''widespread, esp. northern and central Germany'') * {{audio|de|De-arm.ogg|Audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-arm.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|LL-Q188 (deu)-Sebastian Wallroth-Arm.wav|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Armes|gen2=Arms|Arme|Ärmchen|dim2=Ärmlein}} # {{lb|de|anatomy}} an [[arm]] # {{lb|de|textiles}} a [[sleeve]] # anything that resembles an [[arm]] (''for example parts of a device, machine, etc.'') # {{lb|de|geography}} an [[arm]] of a [[creek]] or a [[river]] # {{lb|de|figuratively}} a [[branch]], a [[section]] of a structure ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|sleeve}} {{l|de|Ärmel}} {{g|m}} * {{sense|branch}} {{l|de|Branche}} {{g|f}}, {{l|de|Zweig}} {{g|m}}, {{l|de|Filiale}} {{g|f}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3 |de|[[die Arme in die Hüfte stemmen]], [[die Arme in die Seite stemmen]] |Armband |Armbeuge |Armbewegung |Armbbinde |Armbruch |Armbrust |Ärmel |armdick |Armfüßler |Armgelenk |Armhaltung |Armknochen |armlang |Armlehne |Armleuchter |armlos |Armmuskel |Armmuskulatur |Armprothese |Armreif |Armring |Armschützer |Armvene |Armverletzung |Oberarm |Unterarm |Vorderarm }} ===See also=== * [[Körper]] {{g|m}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
